amendatorysection.catchline: Poisons; sale; false representation or use of fictitious name by purchaser, prohibited.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be unlawful for any person to give or sign a fictitious name or, in order to procure any poison, to make any false representation to the person from whom the same is procured; and it shall be unlawful for any person delivering any poison under the provision of section 71-2503 knowingly to make a fictitious, false or misleading entry in the Poison Register.
